lines.text: By the Power of Grayskull!
For the Honor of Grayskull!
[Adora becomes She-Ra]
I am She-Ra!

[Adam becomes He-Man]
I have the power!
This looks like double trouble!
Assemble my soldiers! We will level Snake Mountain if need be!
Are you done yet, Adam?
A work of art like my famous spiced bread takes time, Cringer.
I'd rather spend my time eating than cooking.
Skeletor, you traitor!
[last lines]
Farewell, She-Ra... Princess of Power!
Farewell, He-Man... dear brother!
A female He-Man! Aw-Haw! This is the worst day of my life!
Adora, the Horde stole you from your parents when you were a tiny baby, so you never knew your mother, and you never knew your father. But you also had a twin brother...
[a dramatic gasp comes from Adora]
This man is your brother, Adora. And Adora, he needs your help. For the honor of Grayskull Adora!
For the honor of Grayskull?
[picks up the Sword of Protection]
For the honor of Grayskull.
[as the Magna Beam reaches full power, a drained He-Man slumps]
No! My brother!
[raises sword]
For the honor of Grayskull!
[Adora's first transformation into She-Ra begins]
Welcome to the Laughing Swan, stranger. How may we serve you today?
Uh, how about a little chow?
Uh, your uh, your animal, he... uh... he speaks?
Well, doesn't everybody?
Skeletor to King Randor, Skeletor to King Randor. Come in, you royal boob!
I've got that flying horsey in my sights!
[first lines]
You may have defeated us, but you'll never see this child again! Ah-Hahahahahahahaha!
Oh deary my!
Razzle dazzle, doozle drear; horrid vines disappear!
Horrid monster disappear, not horrid vines.
Oops!

[Swift Wind is hit by an energy ray]
She-Ra... I... hurt!
Oh, Swift Wind's dying. I can feel the pain. If only there was something I could do...

[seeing She-Ra's hands glowing on Swift Wind's wing as she weeps beside him]
She-Ra! Your hands! Look, they're glowing.
Can it be? For the honor of Grayskull, let your wounds be healed!
You're the one I came to find?
Is that so?
[He-Man is stunned from behind]
You're mine now stranger. You... and this curious sword.
Greetings, Princess!

[shocked]
Hordak!
I'll stop ya, muscle man!

[grabs Scorpia's pincer arms]
That's not very lady-like. Then again, you're not much of a lady, are you?
Hmm, this is just a waste of time. Those rebels will never give themselves up.
[purrs]
Weeee should destroy the village. At least then we'd have some funnnnnnnn.
She'd never let us do it!
Who cares about her? She shouldn't even be leading us. Why, if she wasn't Hordak's favorite...
What was that, Leech?
Ehhh, nothing, Force Captain!

[He-Man has a finger on Adoras holster as she was going to pull out her gun]
You don't need this.
Cringer, you stay here, you're too noticeable. Sorry.
Oh, that's okay, Adam!

[Adam has introduced himself to Bow]
Mine is Bow. Good to meet you, Adam.

[after crash landing]
Blast! I must learn to control my rocket form better! Where could I be? Castle Grayskull? By Horde World, I'm back on Eternia!
Well, Adam, we- we've done as you've asked. Now where is this surprise of yours? Must we wait all day?
All right. You can open your eyes now.

[uncovers her eyes, sees Adora]
Who's that?
By the Ancients!
It's about ti...
[King Randor exhales sharply. The Queen opens her eyes and exhales sharply]
Adora!

[running to her parents]
Mother! Father!
My daughter! Oh, my dear sweet daughter!
Daughter? Uh, I don't understand.

[wiping away a tear]
Why she's Adora, Adam's twin sister. And she's back after all this time!
Son, I want you to know that today, you've made me the happiest man on all Eternia!
[hugs Adam]
The royal family of Eternia is whole once more! And by the Ancients, I swear that nothing shall ever separate us again!
You are not returning to Eternia with me, are you?
I can't. Hordak was right. One battle doesn't win a war. And it's a war Etheria's fighting. I'm needed here He-Man, at least for now. Tell mother and father I love them.
I will.
I don't like that song.
[blasts the Bard's harp, destroying it]
You left me with our enemies!
And you betrayed me to those same enemies. So I say we are even.
Perhaps you are right.

[weakly]
Who are you?
A friend.
The Sword of Power. My sword.
Of course, the Sword of Power!
Well, that takes care of the rebels.
You haven't won yet. I suggest you let my friends go.
Who's that?
Another rebel, no doubt. My shocker rifle will take care of him!
